name: 西方漢學導論
description: 西方漢學自二十世紀中期以來，在中國史研究中的角色愈趨重要，甚至具有主導研究議題與方法的力量。本課程主旨在於向學生介紹西方漢學概況，透過細讀具有重要影響力的英文論文原文，培養學生幾個層次的能力：（1）學術英文閱讀能力，（2）英文詞彙含義的細緻辨識力，（3）邏輯思考的推論能力，（4）英文漢學重要研究成果的掌握能力。
goals: 英文詞彙含義的細緻辨識力。
英文漢學重要研究成果的掌握能力
syllabus:
第一週

簡介

第二週

西方漢學歷史簡介

第三週

區域史：

G. W. Skinner, “The Structure of Chinese History,” _Journal of Asian Studies_ 44:2 (1985), pp.271-292.  

第四週

地方轉型（1）

Robert Hymes, “Elite Transformation: from Northern to Southern Sung,” in Robert Hymes,

_Statesmen and Gentlemen: The Elite of Fu-chou, Chiang-hsi, in Northern and Southern Sung_ (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1986), pp.82-123.

第五週

地方轉型（2）

Robert Hymes, “Elite Transformation: from Northern to Southern Sung,” in Robert Hymes,

_Statesmen and Gentlemen: The Elite of Fu-chou, Chiang-hsi, in Northern and Southern Sung_ (Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1986), pp.82-123.

第六週

士人

Peter Bol, “The Sung Examination System and the _Shih,_“ _Asia Major_, Third Series, (1990), pp.149-171.

第七週

地方精英（1）

Joseph W. Esherick and Mary Backus Rankin, “Introduction,” in Joseph W. Esherick and Mary Backus Rankin, eds., Chinese Local Elites and Patterns of Dominance (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1990).

第八週

地方精英（2）

Joseph W. Esherick and Mary Backus Rankin, “Introduction,” in Joseph W. Esherick and Mary Backus Rankin, eds., Chinese Local Elites and Patterns of Dominance (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1990).

第九週

道學（1）

Hoyt Cleveland Tillman, “A New Direction in Confucian Scholarship: Approaches to Examining the Differences between Neo-Confucianism and Tao-hsueh,” _Philosophy East and West_ 42:3 (1992), pp. 455-74.

第十週

道學（2）

W. Theodore de Bary, “The Uses of Neo-Confucianism: A Response to Professor Tillman,” _Philosophy East and West_ 43:3 (1993), pp. 541-55.

Tillman’s response, 44:1 (1994), pp. 135-42. De Bary’s reply, pp. 143-44.

第十一週

宗教（1）

James Watson, “Standardizing the Gods: The Promotion of T’ien Hou (“Empress of Heaven”) Along the South China Coast, 960-1960,” David Johnson, Andrew Nathan, and Evelyn Rawski eds., _Popular Culture in Late Imperial China_ (Berkeley: University of California Press, 1985), pp.292-324.

第十二週

宗教（2）

Paul Katz, “Orthopraxy and Heteropraxy beyond the State: Standardizing Ritual in Chinese Society,” _Modern China_ 33:1 (2007), pp.72-90.

第十三週

書籍史

Hilde de Weerdt, “The Discourse of Loss in Song Dynasty Private and Imperial Book Collecting,” _Library Trends_ (2007), pp.404-420.

第十四週

閱讀史

Joseph Dennis, “Chapter 7: Reading and Using Gazetteers,” in Joseph Dennis, _Writing, Publishing, and Reading Local Gazetteers in Imperial China, 1100-1700_ (Cambridge, MA.: Harvard University Press, 2015).

第十五週

遊牧民族

Joseph Fletcher, “The Mongols: Ecological and Social Perspectives,” _Harvard Journal of Asiatic Studies_ 46:1(1986), pp.11-50.

第十六週

公民社會（1）

William T. Rowe, “The Public Sphere in Modern China,” _Modern China_ 16:3 (Jul 1990), pp.309-329.

第十七週

公民社會（2）

Philip C.C. Huang, “'Public sphere' / 'civil society' in China? The third realm between state and society,” Modern China 19:2 (Apr 1993), pp. 216-240.

第十八週

綜合討論

methodologies.note: 使用自行編製之教材，在課堂上講授。
在課堂與學生一字一句的細讀英文論文，討論其意義。

grading.note: 課堂報告：讀完一篇英文論文後，學生均要撰寫一篇讀書報告。
針對學生在課堂上對閱讀與討論的參與程度，予以評分。
